meanings.sent1: The inherences of kindness and compassion were evident in her actions.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic that is inherent.

meanings.sent2: His intelligence and wit are clear inherences that make him stand out.

meanings.sent5: The striking inherences of determination and perseverance helped her overcome every obstacle.
